title: Understanding the Purpose
text: Consider why the story within the data might be more impactful than individual facts.

title: Significance of Clarity
text: Think about how presenting data clearly could affect an audience's understanding or engagement.

title: The Role of Perspective
text: Consider why stepping back from the data could provide a clearer view of its significance.

hintAnswer: You need to step back from the data to be able to focus on the true "so what" (the story in the data).
title: Focusing on the "So What"
text: When presenting data, the main aim is often to drive a certain point or action. Reflect on how stepping back might help emphasize this.
choices: You need to step back from the data to be able to focus on the true "so what" (the story in the data).
You need to forget your data and focus on the visuals.
You need to emulate an audience that knows nothing about your data to communicate it.
